text:
e="preserve">Leida Rammo (18 April 1924 – 23 July 2020) was an Estonian actress and theatre director. Her career has lasted seventy years. She was born in Tallinn. She was known for her roles as Leiane in "A Young Retiree" (1972) and as the dormitory guard in "The Fencer" (2015).
Rammo died on 23 July 2020 in Tallinn, aged 96.
